resources.string: "Show notification when scheduling a new alarm"
"Play a sound when scheduling a new alarm"
"Allows to shake the phone in order to snooze"

"The main screen displays alarms configured by the user.
 An active alarm is framed in green, on the contrary an inactive alarm is framed in red.
 The letters F and V located on the right side of each clock indicate respectively if the fading or the vibration is on.
 Three actions are available from the main screen : - add a new alarm by clicking on the + button on the top left of the screen, - delete an existing alarm by drag and drop on the trash button, - duplicate an existing alarm by drag and drop on the button with two clocks.
 The configuration screen of an alarm allows to : - enable or disable an alarm, - set up the hour and days for which the alarm will triggered, - define the duration of the fading, - enable or disable the vibration, - define the duration of the snooze, - choose the musics used by the alarm.
 When several musics are selected, the music will be randomly choose by the alarm."
